titleStmt.title: The historie of Iudith in forme of a poeme. Penned in French, by the noble poet, G. Salust. Lord of Bartas. Englished by Tho. Hudson.
Histoire de Judit. English
titleStmt.author: Du Bartas, Guillaume de Salluste, seigneur, 1544-1590.
Hudson, Thomas, 16th/17th cent.

notesStmt.note: A translation of: Histoire de Judit.
At foot of title: Cum priuilegio regali.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
